titles.title: Fishing Equipment Tax Relief Act of 2023
Fishing Equipment Tax Relief Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a reduced excise tax rate for portable, electronically-aerated bait containers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Fishing Equipment Tax Relief Act of 2023
This bill reduces from 10% to 3% the excise tax rate that applies to the sale of portable, electronically-aerated bait containers by the manufacturer, producer, or importer.
